rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Highspire enters the battlefield, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play one of them this turn, and
you may play an additional land this turn.
rules_text2: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. When that mana is spent to cast a spell, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card that costs less. If it's a land, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
